title: Web Form Design
subtitle: Filling in the Blanks
author: Luke Wroblewski
notes: Luke asked me to contribute a perspective on developing web forms in HTML to his seminal exploration of form design. This is a must-read book if you don’t have a copy.

title: Accelerated DOM Scripting
subtitle: with Ajax, APIs, and Libraries
author: Jonathan Snook with Aaron Gustafson, Stuart Langridge, Dan Webb
notes: When I was asked to contribute a chapter to Jonathan Snook’s book on JavaScript, I was floored. I got to pick the topic, so I wrote about upgrading FAQ pages with JavaScript.

title: AdvancED DOM Scripting
subtitle: Dynamic Web Design Techniques
author: Jeffrey Sambells with Aaron Gustafson
notes: I contributed a chapter exploring the creation of a custom-designed, accessible `select` element to Jeffrey Sambells’ advanced JavaScript technique book.

title: Web Design in a Nutshell
author: Jennifer Robbins
notes: Jen Robbins’s <cite>Web Design in a Nutshell</cite> is the prefect desktop reference for all things web design-related. I contributed three chapters to the 3rd edition, covering CSS, JavaScript, and the DOM.
